CustomField.formula: IF(AND (OR(ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Twitter"),ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Instagram"),ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Facebook"), ISPICKVAL(Origin, "YouTube")) , Response_Time_Minutes__c > 0 && Response_Time_Minutes__c <= 15), TRUE, IF(AND(ISPICKVAL(Origin, "Email"), Response_Time_Minutes__c > 0 && Response_Time_Minutes__c <= 60), TRUE, FALSE))
CustomField.label: Achieve response time
